CustomField.formula:
IF( ExpiryDateStatus__c = "Good", " All Good ", NULL)
&
IF(VaccineDueDistemper__c < TODAY(), IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINALPng&versionId=068c00000013Ric&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05Tc0000006l4b4",'*',15,15) & " Distemper Vaccination is expired" & BR() , IMAGE("/img/samples/rating2.gif",'*') & " Distemper Vaccination is good until " & TEXT(VaccineDueDistemper__c) & BR())
&
IF(VaccineDueHepatitis__c < TODAY(), IMAGE("/img/samples/rating1.gif",'*') & " Hepatitis Vaccination is expired" & BR() , IMAGE("/img/samples/rating2.gif",'*') & " Hepatitis Vaccination is good until " & TEXT(VaccineDueHepatitis__c) & BR())
&
IF(VaccineDueParainfluenza__c < TODAY(), IMAGE("/img/samples/rating1.gif",'*') & " Parainflunenza Vaccination is expired" & BR() , IMAGE("/img/samples/rating2.gif",'*') & " Parainflunenza Vaccination is good until " & TEXT(VaccineDueParainfluenza__c) & BR())
&
IF(VaccineDueParvovirus__c < TODAY(), IMAGE("/img/samples/rating1.gif",'*') & " Paravovirus Vaccination is expired" & BR() , IMAGE("/img/samples/rating2.gif",'*') & " Paravovirus Vaccination is good until " & TEXT(VaccineDueParvovirus__c) & BR())
&
IF(VaccineDueRabies__c < TODAY(), IMAGE("/img/samples/rating1.gif",'*') & " Rabies Vaccination is expired" & BR() , IMAGE("/img/samples/rating2.gif",'*') & " Rabies Vaccination is good until " & TEXT(VaccineDueRabies__c) & BR())
&
IF(PhysicalExamDue__c < TODAY(), IMAGE("/img/samples/rating1.gif",'*') & " Physical Exam is not up to date" & BR() , IMAGE("/img/samples/rating2.gif",'*') & " Physical Exam is good until " & TEXT(PhysicalExamLatest__c) & BR())
CustomField.label: Health Care Records Status
